title: Navigation Array 90° Clockwise 🔁
description: Navigation systems require 90-degree clockwise 🔁 rotation calibration. Study the positional transformation patterns.
hints: The grid rotates 90 degrees clockwise 🔁 around the center. Think of it as the direction of the hands of a clock moving forward.
Top-left moves to top-right, top-right to bottom-right.
Each position shifts one step clockwise 🔁 around the grid. So if the top-left is at 12 o'clock, it will move to 3 o'clock.
